reason.raw: This model is not expected to be incorporated for the Cave Circuit to encourage teams to use alternate and multi-modal sensing approaches to overcome the challenges presented by noisy IMU data. Other UAV models are available with upward/downward range data.
reason.html: This model is not expected to be incorporated for the Cave Circuit to encourage teams to use alternate and multi-modal sensing approaches to overcome the challenges presented by noisy IMU data. Other UAV models are available with upward/downward range data.

description.raw:
Okay, one last submission for SSCI:

This vehicle is nearly identical to X3 config 4, but with these changes:

1. Better IMU \(based on ADIS 16448\)
2. Upward laser point scanner and downward laser point scanner for detecting floor and ceiling.

Originally submitted as ssci\_x3\_sensor\_config\_6
